name: My Lovely Pets 2 Collector's Edition
description:
"My lovely Pets 2" is an exciting game, which offers interesting ways to find funny and playful pets, as well as bright hidden objects, and a set of popular mini-games. Meet and make friends with these funny pets in beautiful game locations where they are always ready to hide and fool around.
This is a game with hidden objects and pets. Use your skills and knowledge to play mini-games and find all the hidden objects.

The collector's edition includes:

8 new locations where you can find even more cute animals!
8 new mini-games
8 additional mini-games from previous parts
Beautiful desktop wallpapers
Music Player
Shop with cute pets
